original_text: Again, when the wicked man turneth away from his wickedness that he hath committed, and doeth that which is lawful and right, he shall save his soul alive.
korean_text: 만일 악인이 그 행한 악을 떠나 정의와 공의를 행하면 그 영혼을 보전하리라

sentences.original_text: Again, when the wicked man turneth away from his wickedness
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 악인이 그의 악에서 떠날 때

sentences.original_text: and doeth that which is lawful and right
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 법적이고 옳은 것을 행할 때

sentences.original_text: he shall save his soul alive
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 영혼을 살려서 구원할 것이라
